channel.title: [317] Items in inventory shifted slightly to right?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
This has been giving me a lot of frustration for a long while. I've found myself the (almost) perfect vanilla 317 client but there's something that's been driving me nuts. The inventory is shifted a few pixels to the right (so are the prayers, spells, stats, all inventory tabs are). I want to know what kind of problem this is and how I can fix it. Is it cache? Or is it code in the client that I can hopefully edit and shift a few pixels over?
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5lVx3Gq.png?1[/img]
Thank you guys, I really need this one!

item.title: [317] Items in inventory shifted slightly to right?
item.dc:creator: @Demogorgon Demogorgon
item.description:
@Demogorgon wrote:

X-J-K-X:

Take a look at the drawinterface/drawtabarea method

Thank you so much! I got it

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Items in inventory shifted slightly to right?

Take a look at the drawinterface/drawtabarea method
